name: Zombie Piano Tiles - Stupid Zombies vs Smasher
name_original: Zombie Piano Tiles - Stupid Zombies vs Smasher
description:
In the zombie tiles game tap the zombie window be carful dont tap blank white window
you cant stop smashing the zombi in arcade this game is addictive entertaining game
in this zombie tiles game you feel like a real touch when smash the zombie
In this game Three game mode are available Classic, Arcade and Time in play store with full game
time perfaction of moving the all tiles.this zombie tiles game to free for kids.
Classic :- For competing towards achiving the completion in shortest time, and get score with the this stupid zombie tiles in this level.

Arcade :- zombie is a enemy of human we should kill the zoombie in this game to each and every zombie window dont stop to tap.

Time :- time mode is a provide a some limit to kill or smash the zombie it depends your taping speed to how much you smash this little zombie
